meanings.definition: A type of leafy green vegetable often used in salads.
meanings.sent1: I added some fresh rugola to my salad for extra crunch.
meanings.sent2: The rugola in the salad added a nice peppery flavor.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit snuck into the garden and stole all the rugola for his own salad.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as refreshing as a bowl of crisp rugola.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the rugola made the salad look like a garden on a plate.

meanings.definition: A type of pastry filled with cheese or other ingredients.
meanings.sent1: I bought a delicious rugola from the bakery for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The rugola was flaky and filled with gooey cheese.
meanings.sent3: The rugola pastry was so cheesy that it made my mouth water.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly baked rugola.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the rugola pastry filled the room with a tempting scent.

meanings.definition: A type of plant in the mustard family, also known as arugula.
meanings.sent1: The rugola plant in the garden grew quickly and abundantly.
meanings.sent2: I harvested some fresh rugola leaves to make a tasty salad.
meanings.sent3: The rugola plant waved in the breeze as if greeting the sun.
meanings.sent4: The rugola plant stood tall and proud among the other vegetables.
meanings.sent5: The peppery taste of the rugola leaves added a zing to the salad.
